author: Juan Jose Orellano Peñalver
description: Just as billed, a bitter version of the contemporary classic Bramble.
name: Bitter Bramble
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
DRIZZLE bitter red liqueur over the cocktail (which will bleed through ice as it sinks)
